metadata.title: CVE-2018-9518 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In nfc_llcp_build_sdreq_tlv of llcp_commands.c, there is a possible out ofbounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions:Android kernel. Android ID: A-73083945.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-9518` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-34-generic - 4.15.0-34.37
